report.title: Get the details for a square
report.description: Return the name and type of a particular square id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=square.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# AND lav.deleted=false WHERE square.id=#square_id# AND square.deleted=false GROUP BY square.centroid_sref,lav.text_value, square.centroid_sref, square.location_type_id,square.id

param.name: square_id
param.display: Id of the square get details for

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.

param.name: pss_mode
param.display: Is the page running on the NPMS (PSS) system rather than splash.

column.name: name
column.sql: case when #pss_mode#=1 then square.centroid_sref else square.centroid_sref || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') end
